item.description:
On Saturday, July 24, 2010, the whole world will be walking again with Scott Kelby in the Third Annual Worldwide Photo Walk. The Seacoast Photographers Group has been given the approval to lead a group through downtown Exeter. Since we have had to postpone our Photo Safari until next month, we wanted to give everyone the opportunity to get in on this.

The Seacoast Photographers Group is another group here on Meetup. I believe you need to register for the event, but I don't know if you have to become a member of that group to register.

If you're interested and plan to attend, please RSVP here and then go to the Seacoast Photographers Group and see what it's all about. There is a limit of 50 attendees for the walk.
item.name: PhotoWalk Tour ...
